arrangements 1.0.2

    • Benchmarking 'arrangements'

    Benchmarking ‘arrangements’

    benchmark.Rmd

    The goal of this document is to compare the performances of some of the existing packages for generating combinations, permutations and partitions.

    • gtools 3.8.1
    • combinat 0.0-8
    • multicool 0.1-10
    • partitions 1.9-19
    • permute 0.9-4
    • permutations 1.0-2
    • RcppAlgos 2.0.3
    • iterpc: it is omitted as arrangements is thought of a replacement of iterpc.
    library(microbenchmark)
library(gtools)
library(combinat)
library(multicool)
library(partitions)
library(permute)
library(permutations)
library(RcppAlgos)
library(arrangements)
gtools.permutations <- gtools::permutations
gtools.combinations <- gtools::combinations
utils.combn <- utils::combn

    gtools::permutations, gtools::combinations and utils::combn are renamed because they are being overwritten by arrangements::permutations, arrangements::combinations and combinat::combn respectively.

    Permutations

    Permutations of 6 items

    microbenchmark(
    gtools = gtools.permutations(6, 6),
    multicool = allPerm(initMC(1:6)),
    partitions = partitions::perms(6),
    permuate = allPerms(6),
    permutations = allperms(6),
    RcppAlgos = permuteGeneral(6, 6),
    arrangements = permutations(6),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr     min      lq   mean median      uq     max neval
##        gtools  454.39  202.64 198.07 195.29 181.998  52.279   100
##     multicool  228.58  103.03  97.77  98.32  90.711  22.905   100
##    partitions    2.11    1.67   1.59   1.66   1.610   0.448   100
##      permuate  767.76  351.03 359.23 344.40 352.784 273.352   100
##  permutations 2198.53 1006.31 943.40 988.66 905.606 167.811   100
##     RcppAlgos    1.02    1.01   1.01   1.06   0.996   1.095   100
##  arrangements    1.00    1.00   1.00   1.00   1.000   1.000   100

    5-Permutations of 7 items

    microbenchmark(
    gtools = gtools.permutations(7, 5),
    RcppAlgos = permuteGeneral(7, 5),
    arrangements = permutations(7, 5),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr    min     lq   mean median     uq    max neval
##        gtools 224.94 204.46 161.94 144.31 143.32 169.68   100
##     RcppAlgos   1.00   1.00   1.00   1.00   1.00   1.00   100
##  arrangements   1.18   1.11   1.12   1.16   1.06   1.65   100

    Permutations of multiset

    f <- c(2, 1, 2, 1, 2)
x <- rep(1:5, f)
microbenchmark(
    multicool = allPerm(initMC(x)),
    RcppAlgos = permuteGeneral(5, freqs = f),
    arrangements = permutations(freq = f),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr     min      lq   mean  median      uq     max neval
##     multicool 1753.69 1726.52 758.99 1377.32 1268.02 23.1409   100
##     RcppAlgos    1.00    1.00   1.00    1.00    1.00  1.0000   100
##  arrangements    1.03    1.08   0.62    1.05    1.06  0.0315   100

    K-Permutations of multiset

    f <- c(2, 1, 2, 1, 2)
x <- rep(1:5, f)
microbenchmark(
    multicool = allPerm(initMC(x)),
    RcppAlgos = permuteGeneral(5, 6, freqs = f),
    arrangements = permutations(freq = f, k = 6),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr      min       lq    mean  median       uq     max neval
##     multicool 2905.682 2680.943 985.576 2313.92 1884.229 27.5770   100
##     RcppAlgos    1.000    1.000   1.000    1.00    1.000  1.0000   100
##  arrangements    0.968    0.917   0.429    1.06    0.987  0.0163   100

    Combinations

    7-Combinations of 15 items

    microbenchmark(
    gtools = gtools.combinations(15, 7),
    combinat = combn(15, 7),
    utils = utils.combn(15, 7),
    RcppAlgos = comboGeneral(15, 7),
    arrangements = combinations(15, 7),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr   min     lq   mean median     uq    max neval
##        gtools 359.9 312.18 279.57 302.55 305.10 128.52   100
##      combinat  90.0  75.00  68.69  69.90  71.66  39.26   100
##         utils 108.8  90.91  83.41  84.44  93.14  46.36   100
##     RcppAlgos   1.0   1.00   1.00   1.00   1.00   1.00   100
##  arrangements   1.4   1.37   1.31   1.28   1.43   1.26   100

    Combinations with replacement of 9 items

    microbenchmark(
    gtools = gtools.combinations(9, 6, repeats.allowed = TRUE),
    RcppAlgos = comboGeneral(9, 6, repetition = TRUE),
    arrangements = combinations(9, 6, replace = TRUE),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr    min     lq   mean median    uq    max neval
##        gtools 281.72 270.14 232.75 205.20 209.5 670.24   100
##     RcppAlgos   1.00   1.00   1.00   1.00   1.0   1.00   100
##  arrangements   1.18   1.18   1.13   1.21   1.1   1.07   100

    Combinations of multiset

    f <- c(2, 1, 2, 1, 2, 2, 1, 2)
x <- rep(1:8, f)
microbenchmark(
    RcppAlgos = comboGeneral(8, 6, freqs = f),
    arrangements = combinations(freq = f, k = 6),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr min   lq  mean median   uq   max neval
##     RcppAlgos   1 1.01 0.998   1.01 1.01 0.908   100
##  arrangements   1 1.00 1.000   1.00 1.00 1.000   100

    Partitions

    Partitions of 30

    microbenchmark(
    partitions = parts(30),
    arrangements = partitions(30),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr  min  lq mean median   uq  max neval
##    partitions 3.47 2.9 2.88   2.87 2.85 1.29   100
##  arrangements 1.00 1.0 1.00   1.00 1.00 1.00   100

    Partitions of 50 into 10 parts

    microbenchmark(
    partitions = restrictedparts(50, 10, include.zero = FALSE),
    arrangements = partitions(50, 10),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr  min   lq mean median  uq  max neval
##    partitions 3.71 3.79 4.18   3.79 3.9 9.14   100
##  arrangements 1.00 1.00 1.00   1.00 1.0 1.00   100
